description: ExtentReports (by Anshoo Arora) is a HTML reporting library for .NET and Java which is extremely easy to use and creates beautiful execution reports. It shows test and step summary, test steps and status in a toggle view for quick analysis.
releaseNotes:
(#28) Fixed issue Run Info View - "Started At" is picking wrong time
		(#32) Using TestNG listener, correct test start and end times will be reported, correct total-time will be reported
		Fixed issue with a long test-name going out of bounds
summary:
ExtentReports (by Anshoo Arora) is a reporting library for automation testing for .NET and Java. It creates detailed and beautiful HTML reports for modern browsers. ExtentReports shows test and step summary along with dashboards, system and environment details for quick analysis of your tests.

Features:

    Very simple to use
    Beautiful and responsive UI
    Provides dashboard for the entire run
    Organizes all used media (screen-captures, videos) for the run in a single view (2.x)
    Supports using parallel runs via TestNG (2.x)
title: ExtentReports
